Text: RE Networks Enron Net Works NDA Cc in paragraph is acceptable Please forward the documents for execution as you have suggested Jennifer Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday February PM To Jennifer Farac Cc Subject Re Networks Enron Net Works NDA Jennifer I sincerely apologize to you for my delay in responding I had honestly thought I had done so but guess I was wrong I have reviewed the comments you made to the agreement and have the following comments Paragraph First insertion of or those of its affiliates this is acceptable Paragraph Second insertion of or its affiliates Since the term Company is not a defined term and as a defined term is not used elsewhere in the agreement I would proposed that the provision where this word appears be redrafted to state Without limiting the generality of the foregoing each such Representative must be specifically informed that heshe can use the Confidential Information solely in hisher capacity as a Representative of the Protected Party Paragraph The change to this area for New York law is fine Presuming the change in Paragraph is acceptable I will have the final documents prepared signed and forwarded for signature to your attention Mark Senior Counsel ENA Phone Facsimile EMail Jennifer Farac JenniferFara To cc Vanessa Wittman Subject Networks Enron Net Works NDA PM Mark I have reviewed your standard form NDA and have noted two minor comments thereon I have suggested the State of New York as a more neutral jurisdiction and one that is widely used in commerical transactions rather than the State of Texas The other comments are self explanatory Please contact me should you have any concerns Networks Enron NDAdoc Jennifer Farac Legal Counsel networks inc Direct Fax Email NOTE This email message contains information that is confidential and may be privileged It is intended only for the addressee If you have received this email message in error please email the sender by replying to it and then deleting it We appreciate your assistance in correcting this error See attached file Networks Enron NDAdoc
